name: Slime Mold Adventrue
description:
A group of slime molds is very hungry, so they split into individual individuals to look for. Moving consumes energy, sugars and lollipops will give you extra energy, the current slime mold will die when the energy is exhausted, and all slime molds will die when all energy is exhausted. Each walk will generate a trajectory, and walking on the generated trajectory will speed up the movement. Repeat dying and find the cake!

------------------------
Controls:
WASD - move

------------------------
Cube sugar: Add energy.
Lolipop: Add all cells energy.

------------------------

Devs: David,Yao,Valia
